title: When is round 2 counselling of pes?
content: I'm sorry if this post doesn't belong here, but I'm very confused, could someone please give me an idea of when this round 2 counselling of pes is? Thanks in advance.

comments.body: you will recieve an email from them
I had mailed them asking about the 2nd counselling there ws no reply
ah I see, if you get a reply, could you please tell me? Thank you!
There will be no reply ig, I had asked them a week beforeðŸ¥²
oh I see. What are you planning to do then?
The last date to surrender PESSAT seats is July 15th as per the website so round 2 will likely be after that.
